name: split-menu-button
description: A Split Menu Button combines a push button and menu button.

label.description: Text to show in the button.

items.description: Items describe the menu items rendered by the menu button.

disabled.description: Specifies that the button element should be disabled.

width.description: Specifies that the button style width

chroming.description: Indicates in what states the button has chromings in background and border.

outlined.description: Outlined buttons are salient, but lighter weight than solid buttons. Outlined buttons are useful for secondary actions.

solid.description: Solid buttons stand out, and direct the user's attention to the most important actions in the UI.

callToAction.description: A Call To Action (CTA) button guides the user to take or complete the action that is the main goal of the page or page section. There should only be one CTA button on a page at any given time.

ojAction.description: Triggered when a button is clicked, whether by keyboard, mouse, or touch events. To meet accessibility requirements, the only supported way to react to the click of a button is to listen for this event.

setProperty.description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a corresponding event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

getProperty.description: Retrieves the value of a property or a subproperty.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

setProperties.description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.
